topic.title: Surgery Assessment Result String - conformance rules

section.p: Contains the response to an surgical assessment question requiring a textual answer.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type String
Contains the response to an surgical assessment question requiring a textual answer.

Contains exactly one [1..1] questionId with data type Id
Unique identifier for the assessment response result.

Contains exactly one [1..1] surgeryAssesmentCode with data type Code
Code that identifies the assessment being performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] assessmentTime with data type Point In Time
Contains the date and time the assessment questions were taken.

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type String
Contains the response to an surgical assessment question requiring a textual answer.
